title: Drive Test Audit Tool
description: Built a web-based Drive Test Audit Tool using HTML, CSS, Python, and Firestore with automated data validation and analysis to streamline field operations and ensure test accuracy

title: Ticket raising Tool
description: Developed a full-stack Ticket Raising Tool using React.js, Node.js, REST APIs, and Firebase to enable real-time issue tracking, authentication, and status updates for company devices.

title: Disease detection in poultry farming
description: Developed a YOLOv8-CNN system for real-time chicken disease detection using visual data and labeled datasets and color-coded bounding box visualization..
